name: Raccoon Launcher
description:
My very first try to create a game with AMS (Autoplay Media Studio) - an answer to a funny comment on the CubeWorld.org Forum where someone said there are so many launchers (apps to start other software) and he wants one to launch Raccoons. 

After I got Construct 2 I started to make another version of it called Moon Raccoon. A space shooter with different enemies and a boss fight.
